title: Prescriptions For Health
content: Listenerâ€™s poem on Chem Trails Chemical plants need to prepare for possible terrorist attacks Obama backtracking on... <!--more--> smog plan and bowing to big business 911 The prevalence of mental Illness NSAIDS adverse affects including the newest: they more than double the risk of miscarriage Clinical trial results should be available to the public Health Care Reform Chocolate linked to heart health NIH revises financial conflict of interest rules a little Many seniors are discharged from the hospital with out their medications or instructions Tips: #1 Clever Definitions One Day at a Time Callers: David - suggests a new private investigation by the people that is not political Harvey - ALS may be an autoimmune disease
